Name: Dig Deep
About the game: Join the Intergalactic Mining Guild and prepare for a wild adventure full of alien creatures, deathly traps and gold... lots of gold! Meet Roger, the most famous moustached, toupeed miner of the galaxy! Help him and his friends gather valuable gold on a dangerous mission into the endless abyss of an ancient planet. Frenzied gameplay Explore a randomly generated planet Simple controls Upgrade your mining gear Tons of side missions to complete Recruit new miners with special abilities Pixel Art graphics and a Chiptune soundtrack that will cause your moustache hairs to stand up üôãüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Credits Created by Fernando Garc√≠a Bernal and Fran Tovar Music by RoccoW üñ• About desktop version Dig Deep was originally designed as a premium mobile game and was published in 2016 by Noodlecake . After two years we've decided to make this desktop version and released it for free. We hope you enjoy the game!
